## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a6a557884e0d719bf03d3f9bc8be53d7da8a2607b4a7409ea7092391ee3e1c91)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'u-workflow.module.common.hour-of-week' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
